paper_abstract: We show that there are Sigma(0)(3)-complete languages of infinite words accepted by non-deterministic Petri nets with Buchi acceptance condition, or equivalently by Buchi blind counter automata. This shows that omega-languages accepted by non-deterministic Petri nets are topologically more complex than those accepted by deterministic Petri nets. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the topological complexity of omega-languages of non-deterministic Petri nets
